modelAgenda

Class ModelAgenda

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractListModel<E>
      • javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.lang.String>
        • modelAgenda.ModelAgenda
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.ListModel<java.lang.String>

    public class ModelAgenda
extends javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.lang.String>
    The model that manages all the modification actions on the property file.
    Author:
    Laure
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
